column4: The sound bugs on my hoary, I have to type "killall -9 esd" before being able to listen to anything. Can I fix that ?

i always have the following error msg in synaptics: "W: GPG error: ftp://ftp.nerim.net unstable Release: The following signatures couldn't be verified because the public key is not available: NO_PUBKEY 07DC563D1F41B907"
check the RestrictedFormats wiki in the marillat section for more info
